forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 28F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 28F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 47F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of light rain and snow later in the day. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening. The rain and snow will change to rain showers overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
